words.source: Wayyiqtol 3mp; vav-consecutive + qal imperfect; KJV, ESV, NASB all 'said'
Preposition; directional marker; all versions 'to'
Proper noun; Egyptian title; all versions 'Pharaoh'
Infinitive construct + preposition; guwr = to turn aside, lodge temporarily; KJV 'to sojourn', ESV 'to live', NASB 'to sojourn'
Preposition + definite article + feminine noun; all versions 'in the land'
Qal perfect 1cp; all versions 'we have come' or 'we came'
Causal conjunction; introduces reason; all versions 'for'
Particle of negation; existential; all versions 'no' or 'there is no'
Masculine noun; from raah = to feed/graze; all versions 'pasture'
Preposition + definite article + feminine noun; tsoan = flock of sheep/goats; all versions 'for the flocks'
Relative pronoun; introduces relative clause; all versions 'which' or implicit in English
Preposition + definite article + masculine plural noun + 2ms possessive suffix; all versions 'your servants'
Causal conjunction; introduces second reason; all versions 'for'
Qal perfect 3ms; kabed = heavy, severe, grievous; KJV 'sore', ESV 'severe', NASB 'severe'
Definite article + masculine noun; raab = hunger, famine; all versions 'the famine'
Preposition + definite article + feminine noun; all versions 'in the land'
Proper noun; Kenaan = humiliated; all versions 'Canaan'
Vav-conjunctive + temporal adverb; all versions 'and now' or 'now therefore'
Qal jussive 3mp; yashab = to sit, dwell, settle; all versions 'let dwell' or 'let live'
Particle of entreaty; softens imperative; all versions 'please' or 'we pray thee'
Masculine plural noun + 2ms possessive suffix; all versions 'your servants'
Preposition + definite article + feminine noun; all versions 'in the land'
Proper noun; Goshen = residence of Israelites in Egypt; all versions 'Goshen'
